title: Create JSON serialization parity tests
description: YAML test cases that load the same Issue data in both implementations and verify byte-for-byte identical JSON output. Critical for file compatibility.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: add JSON serialization parity tests for IssueData and ProjectConfiguration across Python and Rust.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Added expected JSON fixtures and Python/Rust serialization parity tests. All checks passed (make check-python, make check-rust, spec parity).
